title: Poison and Prejudice
description: When Izzy agreed to become an undercover poison taster, she didn’t anticipate that it might involve driving around the streets of Los Angeles with a corpse in the trunk.  Because the police asked her to.  She also didn’t think finding a body together could be considered a bonding experience until she met Connor’s family.  But fate delights in marking its territory all over Izzy’s expectations. And this time she’ll be caught between the powers of Homeland Security, an evil human trafficking ring, and the Taste Society all working toward different ends…
author: Chelsea Field
